summary:
This is a Tattoo skin for all you sons of skyrim out there. My second release to date. Give it a try and when u get board of it just follow the easy uninstall.

____________
Installation
____________
Extract \"textures\" to ...\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data folder.


____________
Uninstall
____________
go into ...\\skyrim\\D
descriptionHtml:
This is a Tattoo skin for all you sons of skyrim out there. My second release to date. Give it a try and when u get board of it just follow the easy uninstall.

____________
Installation
____________
Extract \"textures\" to ...\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data folder.


____________
Uninstall
____________
go into ...\\skyrim\\Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\male folder, delete \"male\" folder.
author: XeNoN69
